document.full_text: johnson & johnson will pay $78 million to settle u.s. and uk charges that it paid bribes and kickbacks to win business overseas, the first big drug company to settle since the obama administration began its scrutiny of the industry more than a year ago.
document.title: j&j settles u.s., uk bribery, kickback charges
lines_and_colors: johnson & johnson will pay $78 million to settle u.s. and uk charges that it paid bribes and kickbacks to win business overseas, the first big drug company to settle since the obama administration began its scrutiny of the industry more than a year ago.
